name: Sloppy Joe Sandwich Filling
author: thedailygourmet
summary: The traditional sloppy Joe goes south of the border in this tangy, flavorful sandwich filling.
ingredients: ¼ cup chopped poblano chile pepper
1 ½ tablespoons red enchilada dry seasoning (such as Savory Spice Shop® Canyon Road)
1 tablespoon tomato powder (such as Savory Spice Shop®)
½ cup shredded Oaxaca cheese, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat
Cook onion and poblano pepper until softened, about 5 minutes
Add ground beef and chorizo to the skillet
Cook, stirring often to break up meat, until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes
Add enchilada seasoning and tomato powder
Add water, ketchup, and Worcestershire sauce
Return cooked onion mixture to the skillet
Simmer until flavors combine, about 5 minutes more
Serve meat mixture on toasted buns topped with Oaxaca cheese and avocado
